Articles.Content: I was playing a few months ago my modded ksp (Ksp_64x) but it stopt working so i re-install it but it won't work can someyone help me to re-install Ksp_64X so i can play with mods again?

Any logs?

What do you mean by stop working?

Delete everything, not use uninstall, but delete the whole directory, and reinstall.

And, downloading from the store gives you both ksp.exe and ksp_64.exe. either one will work.

You posted just an hour ago that your game is working again.

And if it's just the mod: you have to delete it yourself from the GameData folder. Steam will not remove it if you just use the uninstall option.

Edited August 10, 2018 by Harry Rhodan

yes my normal ksp works but my modded ksp not i can't place mods in my normal ksp

2 hours ago, Xd the great said:

Any logs?

What do you mean by stop working?

Delete everything, not use uninstall, but delete the whole directory, and reinstall.

And, downloading from the store gives you both ksp.exe and ksp_64.exe. either one will work.

i didn't get ksp_64.exe. with it and i did also deleate the game and reinstall it but it won't work

Well, a steam or store download will give you ksp_64x for newer windown versions.

What version are you on? What computer you use? Where did yiu download the game?

Also, downloading a mod is to place it in the gamedata file. Refer to the mod's main thread for details.

Are you hsing incompatible versions of mods?
Thank you guys for your help my game runs perfect now so thanx a lot
